CelestialGrenade.name: Celestial Grenade
CelestialGrenade.description: Summons a deity for one minute.
CelestialGrenade.effect: Summons a deity for one minute.

CharmAnimalPotion.name: Charm Animal Potion
CharmAnimalPotion.description: Tames a Dungeon animal for the duration of the Floor.
CharmAnimalPotion.effect: Tames a Dungeon animal for the duration of the Floor.

ConfusingFog.name: Confusing Fog
ConfusingFog.description: Fills a space with thick wet fog blinding mobs but translucent for the user's party.
ConfusingFog.effect: Fills a space with thick wet fog blinding mobs but translucent for the user's party.

DoloresDoesntSplatPotion.name: Dolores Doesn't Splat Potion
DoloresDoesntSplatPotion.description: In a very early season of Dungeon Crawler World, a crocodilian alchemist crawler created the 'Dolores Doesn't Splat' potion while falling for ten minutes down a deep pit. Dolores combined two potions: one that imitates Katia Grim's Crowd Blast ability, and one that involved breeding of Rock Buffalo. To impregnate an in-heat rock buffalo, the male must penetrate her five times in rapid succession.
DoloresDoesntSplatPotion.effect:
Increased acceleration.
Your body becomes invulnerable for a fraction of a moment, but you still feel pain.
Your body temporarily softens the surface of impact, so you "penetrate deeper than normal.
You slam into the ground, rise 15 ft (4.57m) into the air, and slam into the ground again. Five times.

EyeInTheSkyScroll.name: Eye in the Sky Scroll
EyeInTheSkyScroll.description: Provides information on a target within a wide area.
EyeInTheSkyScroll.effect: Provides information on a target within a wide area.

FailSafe.name: Fail Safe
FailSafe.description: Sends a notification if a trap is disabled or set off.
FailSafe.effect: Sends a notification if a trap is disabled or set off.

GnomishKnockKnock.name: Gnomish Knock-Knock
GnomishKnockKnock.description: Thermobaric explosion causing devastating damage and implosion of lungs.
GnomishKnockKnock.effect: Thermobaric explosion causing devastating damage and implosion of lungs.

GoblinDynamite.name: Goblin Dynamite
GoblinDynamite.description: Extremely volatile explosive with a short fuse.
GoblinDynamite.effect: Extremely volatile explosive with a short fuse.

GoblinSmokeBomb.name: Goblin Smoke Bomb
GoblinSmokeBomb.description: Emits a cloud of stinking multi-color opaque smoke.
GoblinSmokeBomb.effect: Emits a cloud of stinking multi-color opaque smoke.

Gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
Gunpowder.description: Granulated black powder used as a propellant.
Gunpowder.effect: Granulated black powder used as a propellant.

HealCritterPotion.name: Heal Critter Potion
HealCritterPotion.description: Heals injured pets, dungeon familiars, and animal-class mobs.
HealCritterPotion.effect: Heals injured pets, dungeon familiars, and animal-class mobs.

HobgoblinDetonator.name: Hobgoblin Detonator
HobgoblinDetonator.description: Detonates up to ten explosive devices simultaneously.
HobgoblinDetonator.effect: Detonates up to ten explosive devices simultaneously.

HobgoblinPus.name: Hobgoblin Pus
HobgoblinPus.description: Clay-like explosive material that creates a large explosion.
HobgoblinPus.effect: Clay-like explosive material that creates a large explosion.

HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.name: Hobgoblin Smoke Curtain
HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.description: Coats the area in dense white fog affecting physical entities.
HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.effect: Coats the area in dense white fog affecting physical entities.

JugOBoom.name: Jug O' Boom
JugOBoom.description: Causes a small explosion followed by burning splash damage.
JugOBoom.effect: Causes a small explosion followed by burning splash damage.
JugOBoom.duration: Flames burn for 15 seconds per level of attacker's Incendiary Device Handling.

MajorCharlie.name: Major Charlie
MajorCharlie.description: Raises intelligence by 10 points for 30 seconds then lowers intelligence by 10 points for 5 minutes.
MajorCharlie.effect: Raises intelligence by 10 points for 30 seconds then lowers intelligence by 10 points for 5 minutes.

PotionOfBloodlust.name: Potion of Bloodlust
PotionOfBloodlust.description: Doubles strength and movement speed, reduces dexterity and constitution, increases movement speed per kill.
PotionOfBloodlust.effect: Doubles strength and movement speed, reduces dexterity and constitution, increases movement speed per kill.

PotionOfHalfSplat.name: Potion of Half Splat
PotionOfHalfSplat.description: Prevents death from falling damage but leaves the user at 5% health.
PotionOfHalfSplat.effect: Prevents death from falling damage but leaves the user at 5% health.

PotionOfInvisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility
PotionOfInvisibility.description: Turns the drinker invisible for 2 * intelligence seconds.
PotionOfInvisibility.effect: Turns the drinker invisible for 2 * intelligence seconds.

PotionOfPhaseThroughWall.name: Potion of Phase Through Wall
PotionOfPhaseThroughWall.description: Allows the drinker to phase through wood, stone, or metal walls.
PotionOfPhaseThroughWall.effect: Allows the drinker to phase through wood, stone, or metal walls.

ProximityTrigger.name: Proximity Trigger
ProximityTrigger.description: Sets conditions for when traps go off including countdowns and mob type.
ProximityTrigger.effect: Sets conditions for when traps go off including countdowns and mob type.

RevUpToiletGradeMoonshine.name: Rev-Up Toilet-Grade Moonshine
RevUpToiletGradeMoonshine.description: Highly flammable liquid, explosive fumes, various effects upon consumption.
RevUpToiletGradeMoonshine.effect: Highly flammable liquid, explosive fumes, various effects upon consumption.

SatchelBomb.name: Satchel Bomb
SatchelBomb.description: Equivalent to three sticks of hobgoblin dynamite, enough to level a town block.
SatchelBomb.effect: Equivalent to three sticks of hobgoblin dynamite, enough to level a town block.

ShrinkWand.name: Shrink Wand
ShrinkWand.description: Causes items to shrink in size. Has 10 charges.
ShrinkWand.effect: Causes items to shrink in size. Has 10 charges.

SizeUpPotion.name: Size-Up Potion
SizeUpPotion.description: Provides detailed information about mobs including their stats and skills.
SizeUpPotion.effect: Provides detailed information about mobs including their stats and skills.

SnareTrap.name: Snare Trap
SnareTrap.description: Holds the target in place for fifteen seconds.
SnareTrap.effect: Holds the target in place for fifteen seconds.

SpiritBox.name: Spirit Box
SpiritBox.description: Roots the target in place for sixty seconds, lowers spirit resistance, summons a non-corporeal entity.
SpiritBox.effect: Roots the target in place for sixty seconds, lowers spirit resistance, summons a non-corporeal entity.
